thread.title: Emmy Kidd
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Emmy Kidd

author: Emmy Kidd
title: Emmy Kidd
text:
I ordered the value shirt and the quality is very nice and the image was very clear (it was just white however, cannot say for images with multiple colours). For some reason my shirt hadn't been printed for 5 days. I emailed on Saturday evening and got a prompt email on Monday morning saying someone would chase the order up and changed my delivery to express when I had paid for saver. The shirt arrived the next day.
tl;dr
>Even the cheapest shirts feel good (but rather thin which is fine for the summer)
>Unexplained delay was dealt with promptly and shirt arrived at expected time.
